researchBacked.title: Research Backed

neuralNetworks.title: Advanced Neural Networks
neuralNetworks.description: Our AI system uses deep convolutional neural networks trained on millions of crop images to recognize patterns associated with various diseases across different crop types.

cloudProcessing.title: Cloud Processing
cloudProcessing.description: Optimized algorithms allow for near-instant analysis of uploaded images, providing farmers with immediate insights without delays even when used in areas with limited connectivity.

dataDriven.title: Data-Driven Insights
dataDriven.description: Trained on a diverse dataset of over 500,000 images spanning various growing conditions, crop varieties, and disease progression stages to ensure robust detection capabilities.

privacy.title: Privacy-Focused
privacy.description: Your uploaded images are processed securely and never shared with third parties. Images are used anonymously to improve our AI models only with explicit consent.

Corn___Common_Rust.description: A fungal disease causing orange to brown pustules on leaves, reducing photosynthesis.

Corn___Gray_Leaf_Spot.description: Grayish lesions on leaves that expand and merge, leading to reduced crop yield.

Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.description: A fungal disease causing elongated grayish lesions on corn leaves, reducing yield.

Potato___Early_Blight.description: Dark concentric spots on leaves that can spread and cause defoliation.

Potato___Late_Blight.description: A severe fungal disease causing water-soaked lesions, leading to crop destruction.

Sugarcane___Bacterial_Blight.description: Bacterial infection in sugarcane causing leaf streaks, reducing sugar production.

Sugarcane___Red_Rot.description: A severe fungal disease in sugarcane causing reddish discoloration inside stems.
